title: C's regain form, tap into 'darkness' in Game 3 win
description: The Celtics got off to a blistering start from 3 and never looked back as they blew out the Knicks 115-93 in Game 3.
author: Brian Windhorst

title: Saints kick off QB competition as Carr retires
description: Saints starting quarterback Derek Carr has decided to retire because of a labral tear and degenerative rotator cuff injury in his right shoulder, leading the team to begin its QB competition in earnest.
author: Katherine Terrell

title: Champions League race hots up as Man City slip & Villa win
description: Manchester City have dropped points in the race for the Champions League - so who needs what?

title: 'Sorry if we got your hopes up' - Saints avoid unwanted record
description: Southampton avoid becoming an addition to a pub quiz question after moving past Derby County's record low total of 11 points.

title: Mike Trout resumes swinging, plans return to running soon in his recovery from knee bone bruise
description: The 33-year-old Trout confirmed Saturday that he won't be back in the Halos' lineup when he is immediately eligible to come off the injured list Sunday.

title: Detroit Tigers' Jack Flaherty rocked by Texas Rangers for 4 home runs in 10-3 loss
description: Detroit Tigers score: Jack Flaherty allowed four home runs for the first time in his career. He lasted three innings in a 10-3 loss to the Rangers.

title: Lowry into share of Truist Championship lead as McIlroy sits six shots behind
description: Ireland's Shane Lowry and Sepp Straka of Austria stand three shots above the pack after three rounds of the Truist Championship, with Rory McIlroy six off the lead.

title: Sinner wins on return from doping ban in front of home crowd at Italian Open
description: ​​​​​​​World No 1 Jannik Sinner made a solid return from his three-month doping ban in beating 99th-ranked Mariano Navone 6-3 6-4 before an adoring home crowd at the Italian Open on Saturday.
